Introduction

Kangta is a South Korean singer-songwriter, actor, composer, and host under SM Entertainment. He was a member of the boy group H.O.T. Following the group's disbandment in March 2001, he made his solo debut in August 2001 with the album Polaris.

On February 3, 2020, it was revealed by SM Entertainment and Ace Factory that Kangta is in a relationship with actress Jung Yu-mi.
